inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getEndpoint.

clientVpnEndpointId.description: ID of the Client VPN endpoint.

filters.description: One or more configuration blocks containing name-values filters. Detailed below.

tags.description: Map of tags, each pair of which must exactly match a pair on the desired endpoint.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getEndpoint.

arn.description: The ARN of the Client VPN endpoint.

authenticationOptions.description: Information about the authentication method used by the Client VPN endpoint.

clientCidrBlock.description: IPv4 address range, in CIDR notation, from which client IP addresses are assigned.

clientConnectOptions.description: The options for managing connection authorization for new client connections.

clientLoginBannerOptions.description: Options for enabling a customizable text banner that will be displayed on AWS provided clients when a VPN session is established.

connectionLogOptions.description: Information about the client connection logging options for the Client VPN endpoint.

dnsName.description: DNS name to be used by clients when connecting to the Client VPN endpoint.

dnsServers.description: Information about the DNS servers to be used for DNS resolution.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

securityGroupIds.description: IDs of the security groups for the target network associated with the Client VPN endpoint.

selfServicePortal.description: Whether the self-service portal for the Client VPN endpoint is enabled.

selfServicePortalUrl.description: The URL of the self-service portal.

serverCertificateArn.description: The ARN of the server certificate.

sessionTimeoutHours.description: The maximum VPN session duration time in hours.

splitTunnel.description: Whether split-tunnel is enabled in the AWS Client VPN endpoint.

transportProtocol.description: Transport protocol used by the Client VPN endpoint.

vpcId.description: ID of the VPC associated with the Client VPN endpoint.

vpnPort.description: Port number for the Client VPN endpoint.
